title.en: Fate/Grand Order - Crossdressing and Getting Fucked by Futanari Alters to Learn the Pleasure of Being a Woman (Doujinshi)

description.en:
For the sake of a mission, Gudao needs to crossdress for disguise. But Jeanne Alter and Saber Alter feel like he’s not feminine enough for the role. And so they decide to use their massive cocks to turn him into a little bitch. Purely for the sake of the mission, of course.

(Source: FAKKU)
